website_summaries.verdict: 100 masks – 10 each of 10 different formulations – keep your skin silky smooth and healthy. No mineral oil, parabens, silicone or artificial colors. The great price for such a large selection of quality facial masks makes this the best bang for your buck.
pros: Twelve formulations to pamper your face, including aloe vera, aqua, black pearl, blueberry, collagen, cucumber, ginseng, green tea, horse oil, Houttuynia Cordata, pine mushroom and snail
cons: Packaging is labelled in Korean, with minimal English directions
Some of the formulations might not be suited to your skin type

customer_reviews.title: BEYOND SATISFIED
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, it's my first time leaving a review at Amazon no matter how satisfied or disappointed I am. BUT, this is the first time that I am BEYOND satisfied. Great job! I will order again once I run out of my face masks. It is very affordable, comes in a great packaging, and it was delivered promptly. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good masks, didn't break me out
customer_reviews.text: Very good masks, didn't break me out! I've always had terrible acne for the past 7 years and these masks helped dramatically. For me using a mask a day cleared it up, so this mask pack really helped to reduce the costs. About 50 cents for a mask is a really great price. The seller also gave some freebies like a hand mask, blackhead removal kit, and a large sponge which I currently haven't figured out how to use yet. I am super happy with this purchase and will be buying my masks here from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: These sheet masks are a great value. I like to pop a sheet mask on and relax just about every day, which can add up if you’re buying the “name brand” masks. I haven’t found that these make a huge improvement in my skin, but they don’t break me out either. Of course I like some of the mask flavors better than the others. Ginseng, meh, blueberry, yaaaasssssss. The free hand sheet mask that came in the box was a nice addition that I wasn’t expecting! Overall you can’t beat this price for a 5-free sheet mask.
customer_reviews.author: hatband

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing and fits on face well!
customer_reviews.text: I have used korean face masks in the past and they were fine. I decided to take a chance on a new brand, this item, and i'm glad I did! Not only do they fit my face better, but they definitely have more serum in each mask. They smell phenomenal and they came well organized in the box. I keep 25 in the fridge and the rest in my bathroom. I will continue to get these!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Surprenant

customer_reviews.title: Treat yourself today!!! Your worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: All of these masks have the essential basic ingredients- that helps to keep it economical and affordable. They all contain Hyaluronate! They stay on your face. They have plenty of moisture. I even use them for my feet (just fold the face mask in half or cut in half to use on both feet!) Delivery was fast. Packaging was well organized. They even included a few free gifts! What a nice surprise!! Thank You for your hard work and keeping costs low @ 3 employee's in your company- very impressive quality!
customer_reviews.author: gardenlady

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sheet masks!
customer_reviews.text: These masks are amazing! High quality and super hydrating. Fast shipping, my order came two days earlier than amazon anticipated. I also loved the extra masks and eye mask added into my order. I will absolutely order again!
customer_reviews.author: ShaeH

customer_reviews.title: These masks do work ! Feel amazing !
customer_reviews.text: These got here super fast. I opened the box to a bonus headband to use while I enjoy my masks . I was not sure what material the masks would be . They’re soft cloth , not gel . I put mine in the fridge . I applied it and I was having a rough skin day ( irritated ) the mask was so soothing and it felt amazing . It fit my face well and wasn’t too big or too small. It stayed moist the entire time I had it on which was 20 minutes and it and more moisture left in it . Very calm skin after use . Very pleased .
customer_reviews.author: Chandie

customer_reviews.title: each mask is different best out of 3 ive tried
customer_reviews.text: I'm a paper mask lover. I'm only finally getting to enter because I buy in bulk like a hundred at a time. I've tried dermal second best and Malley never again. entels mask come in great packaging. the different types of mask are actually different and very moist. easy to apply I just received 100 as u can see and when I'm out back to a hundred more. I'm no really a review person but I would like women to not be afraid to buy high quality in Entel masks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are ok, you gettons of them so they are a good deal for the money, even gave some to my sister
customer_reviews.text: these masks are good for mositurizing, so far not blown away by them but they seem to keep skin moist in the winter
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturizing, makes my face feel plump without feeling sticky
customer_reviews.text: Love the variety of all of the masks. I use these after I use the Aztec clay mask, to rehydrate my skin and it works amazing together. With the Aztec mask it helps my oily skin and reduce acne, and with this moisturizing mask I feel like I have a baby face after. The mask also sticks to your face after a few minutes so it’s great if you’re doing work. Pros: -Hydrating -No sticky feeling -Great value -Variety -Leaves slight shine -Relaxing -Individually packed Con: -Too many to chose from : ) 😂
customer_reviews.author: Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this...totally worth the price and they give you a little something extra. Mask feel great and work great. Extremely happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Rey

customer_reviews.title: love these masks and they make great gifts!
customer_reviews.text: I used a couple of these and loved them so decided to by a ton of them for myself and I also used them as part of my bridesmaids gift bags. They are really nice especially for the price of them. I tend of have sensitive skin that bounces between dry and oily and irritated a lot but these don't bother anything and they make my skin feel amazing every time I use them. highly recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Product leaking
customer_reviews.text: One of the packs was leaking when it arrived.. there’re ten pieces in one pack but I couldn’t identify which one(s) of the tens was leaking coz it was a mess so I had to get rid of all of the ten pieces. And also there’s no free hairband in the package. I assume it ran out? But since it’s in the product description I would expect to receive it or otherwise it’s false advertising. Other than these, still worth the money although little disappointed
customer_reviews.author: MCY

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Great deal and what I like about these guys is that they aren’t OVERLY moist. I know that sounds weird but I’ve bought some that are way too moist that when I put it on it’s dripping down my neck. These guys do the trick for me and will probably be purchasing more.

They smell great and are very moisturizing without leaving my skin feeling refreshed & not sticky. I would totally purchase these again!

customer_reviews.text: I like trying the different kinds of face sheets. I have tried all at least once. still deciding on my favorite

customer_reviews.text: I think, it is OK for the price. The mask sheet size is a bit awkward. The width between two eyes seems a bit wide comparing other masks that I have used. It dries a bit quickly than others. Overall, it is not a bad deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how they’re doing it ... but they’re doing amazing. My package came with all the masks, plus two bonus masks, a headband with their logo, and a cute little note explaining how they’re a small business. If you support small businesses but are looking for an amazing deal without paying the small business price, buy these. I got these primarily for myself, but will be adding these to other stocking stuffers for Christmas !!!! Loving this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Mills

customer_reviews.title: Value and Efficacy
customer_reviews.text: I have now used 3 of the 10 various masks included in this kit and loved them all. They are better than the stuff you buy at the drug store and literally a fraction of the cost. I made 3 gift baskets for my closest friends so I could introduce them to the product and still have enough to use one daily for the next 70 days.

I do A LOT of amazon shopping, & my reason for picking certain things are always due to helpful reviews so even though this is time consuming, I want to do the same for others. I really like how this one doesn't leave a thick sticky residue on the skin like the other masks I have tried before. The masks aren't uniform in size. Some are wider, smaller etc. Just a small nuisance. The packaging is really nice. I use it as container for the masks. My only real complaint is that it says I got a free sample of a product, but it wasn't there. Just the 72 masks. Still, a worthy purchase.

Eyes and mouth are pre removed.

These are exactly as advertised, and I have had great success with them at a reasonable price.

I’m very happy with these!

customer_reviews.title: Essential items for my skin
customer_reviews.text: I put this on my face every night and it absolutely makes my skin smooth, moist, and even healing. I have used this brand for few years and I will keep buying this product for my skin and my happiness. I can't imagine living without this product. It makes me happy every night. Do not hesitate to buy it. You will not regret your choice.

customer_reviews.title: Great selection & packaged well
customer_reviews.text: I am so thrilled, about receiving this many facial masks the selections are on point. The delivery was 1 day, and the free gift is soooo cute. I used a few from a friend and l was so blown away l had to troll Amazon to find them. My friend kept saying “ l will get you one “ smh that was a year ago lol
customer_reviews.author: Maria Ugbomah

customer_reviews.title: I love these masks
customer_reviews.text: I love these masks! I have been using them daily for a little over a week now and my skin looks great. I have definitely noticed less breakouts, my skin is absolutely glowing, and my pores are a tad bit smaller. My favorite two are definitely the blueberry and the pine mushroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: In love. They make your skin soft and they have ...
customer_reviews.text: In love . They make your skin soft and they have different kinds. The sponge is for the extra essence to put It on your face also I love how they give free samples of other mask as well
customer_reviews.author: krislynn

customer_reviews.title: Great value, and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great value, and great quality. You do need to have time to rest while having this on as I have not successfully been able to put the mask on and "do stuff" around the house. Either way, love, love, love.
customer_reviews.author: agolden

customer_reviews.title: I love how it leaves my skin after
customer_reviews.text: I love how it leaves my skin after, and I'm glad that I'm not running out of these masks anytime soon!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: check ingredients for allergens.
customer_reviews.text: would like longer list of ingredients. Used these as a bridal shower favor and the ladies likd them. Haven't tried all the various flavors. Fun gift.
customer_reviews.author: Enjoys good books

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Great product! And the little hand written note with two extra masks inside was a great touch. Love these. I will be purchasing these again when I run out!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Crosby

customer_reviews.title: Great masks lots to try
customer_reviews.text: Great price for the amount you get and I got 2 extra as a bonus. They fill very nice and made my face feel soft . The instructions are in Japanese but thats ok its a mask. I will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey L. Helms

customer_reviews.title: Gemreatest deal on earth seriously packing in Easter baskets 🐇🐣TY
customer_reviews.text: All superb established needed for Valentines l had disrktrributed and plan Easter vxmbaskets too.love these ty great deal
customer_reviews.author: Hello

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I love the amount and variety. Ingredients and cautions are in English, not the directions. I googled how long to use it. It came with a lovely terry cloth headband, and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Madison
